DataElement.preferredName: Patient Surgical Procedure Complication Grade Present Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the type or grade of a surgical procedure complication that is present.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Surgical Procedure Complication Grade Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to the grade (a position on a scale of intensity or amount) of a surgical procedure (a diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means) complication (any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of, or because of, another disease) that is present (being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.:Complication; any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of (or because of) another disease.:A position on a scale of intensity or amount or quality.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.
Any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of, or because of, another disease, treatment, or procedure.
A position on a scale of intensity or amount or quality.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the type or grade of a surgical procedure complication.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The absence of life or state of being dead.
